reviews.review: Dead by Daylight is incredibly fun yet frustrating, with a high skillcap and a lot of grinding

쉽게 즐길 수 있는 게임임. 게임 곳곳에 유저를 배려한 요소가 돋보임.

The good: Play with friends.

The bad:
"Matchmaking" seems to match people with full perks to people who are new and have no perks.
There's no servers, it's all p2p connections, so there will be games that just lags.
People immediately disconnect if I choose Legion and they tell me he's broken even though I literally just started the game.
There's one building on a map that looks like a farm where cows are butchered. There are loops in the building that allows 1 player to just keep running around faster than the killer. I tried using the huntress and even her hatchets can't go over a fence. 
No party system when playing with friends, you have to constantly re-invite each other.

Just recently started playing and loving it. Just the right mixture between tense horror/action and competitive online play. It has a learning curve as there are many different perks to learn and understand but a fun game when you learn it. Just stick with it for a while to actually learn how to play it correctly before giving up.

May not be as rewarding of a game that most people would like. But I love the game. It is just fun to play. It's strategic with a little horror. It isn't the scariest game. But, it isn't trying to be scary either. There is a lot that goes into every match and both the survivors and killers are fun to play.
If you love to play games just to play games, play this game.

Wish there was rewards for ranking up, but that is a small complaint

The game is pretty fun, difficult? yes, Rage inducing? Maybe, laggy piece of shit? definitely. But through all this i keep coming back to it like a drug addict to a crack den. Suggestions? fix your shitty laggy game and possibly add a new game mode? since we've been playing the same exact thing since the launch of the game with minor changes

Ohhh... my god. An intense game when I started. It would literally raise your heart rate and couldn't sleep after playing. So, you have been warned. I could give 5 stars as a perfect score to play with friends.

It was supposed to be a good game, but the Developers are stupid and don't try balance the game. I was supposed to be a terror game too, but is far from it. I will only get stressed, don't worth your money and time. 

If you play as a survivor you will be most of the time doing generators, where you just sit in place, hold the mouse and press space sometimes. If the killer appears it doesn't matter, you just need to run to every pallet you find until your teammates complete the generator and then you escape. There is no need for fear at all, the killer will lose if you do the things right or you will be the entire game complaining about your teammates that does't do nothing. Very fun.

If you play killer the game is even more terrible. You will have to spend a lot of time running after someone that doesn't give a fck about you being the killer while you just wait for the game to finish and you lose. Survivors will make fun of you because they know the power role is their not yours. Basically i doesn't matter yours skills, if the survivors are good you will lose, you can be the best killer, you will lose and be frustrated.

Basically, if you want to play with your friends as survivors, bullshit killers and make their life terrible, it is a good game. Besides it, it's just not worth it.

A temática, foi interessante, porém só acho alguns assassinos muito apelativos, por exemplo a enfermeira, diferente dos outros você é alertado pela música de suspense, já no caso dela quando a música começa a tocar ela já está em cima de você, porém o que torna o jogo frustrante a ponto de tirar do sério é a noobzada, o objetivo do jogo é ser silencioso, discreto e tranquilo, porém a maioria esquece que é um jogo de terror, com um assassino na cola e resolve transformar o jogo em um simulador de São Silvestre, e resolvem sair correndo de um ponto a outro no mapa como se só tivessem eles, mesmo sabendo que a corrida além de fazer barulho deixa pegadas no chão, que trará o assassino até você e os demais jogadores que estão jogando direito.

great game if ya want something to get lost in
JOGO MUITO RUIM GALERA NAO JOGUEM BELEZA

Was, and could be a good game. Right now, since patch 3.01, lag has been unbearable, most killer lobbies have experienced more and worse types of lag that before patch 3.01, playing the game as a survivor and having the thrilling time of escaping the killer is ruined as 90% of the time LAG will lock you in place or teleport the killer from the survivor perspective. Until dedicated servers or a new patch that has fixed this lag has come out, Dead by Daylight is arguably UNPLAYABLE.
黎明拔线,游戏五分钟，掉线重连三小时。

Dieser Staubsauger ist sehr cool, er schaut nicht nur toll aus, sondern ist auch sehr praktisch. Wir verwenden diesen hauptsächlich in der Küche und Essecke, zack zack alle Krümmel und Zeugs auf dem Boden weg. Der Sauger ist sehr gut verarbeitet, hat vorn noch fünf LED Leuchten, die allerdings immer an sind, diese sind sehr hilfreich, wenn man unterm Tisch und in Ecken saugt, denn man sieht was. Sehr praktisch finde ich auch die Funktion den eigentlichen Handstaubsauger aus der großen Halterung zu nehmen, d.h. eigenltich hat man zwei in einem Staubsauger. Sehr cooles Feacher, hab ich so noch nicht gesehen von keinen großen Marken. Der Akku hält auch sehr lange, mir ist zumindest nichts negativ aufgefallen. Die einzige Aussage, die ich noch nicht machen kann ist die Lebensdauer, dafür hab ich den Sauger noch zu kurz.

Much nice. Give money please need for family and all the new dlc

I have a fair amount of time in the game. Overall I think the game is really complicated to explain. The core gameplay for survivors isn't even something I would consider fun. You hold left click to repair generators while being on the lookout for killer. Oh, they're coming? Time to hold Shift + W until either all the gens have been completed, or I get downed and hooked. The gameplay is so simple it's not really easy to describe as something that sounds fun. The real enjoyment for survivor is in seeing yourself improve. Running chases longer, learning how to loop the killer better and more efficiently.

Playing Killer is a nightmare. Survive With Friends, toxic behaviour by the survivors, and just generally being outnumbered makes killer play really unpleasant. Some survivors play not only to win but to ensure you have the least amount of fun humanly possible. They will teabag you at every corner, blind you in every animation, save their teammates with flashlights, and wait at the exit gates for you to see them leave because they want to assert dominance. Queue times for survivor are so bad right now because no one wants to play killer and be bullied.

Everything said I enjoy the game, but right now this game doesn't deserve a positive review because of the recent actions by the games developers, Behaviour Interactive. A popular DbD twitch streamer and Youtuber DOWSEY recently made a tweet and video criticising the naive comments of the games lead designer during their recent Q&A. In retaliation to criticism, BHVR removed cosmetics from DOWSEYs account claiming they didn't endorse his actions of "targeting a member of the development team". Basically they have set a precedent that if you disagree with them, they will arbitrarily punish you for it because they're above criticism.

If you own the game currently, play it. Have fun. If you own it and you're a content creator, watch out what you say about the game publicly.
lots of toxic but very fun

Не так давно приобрёл себе данную игру и она полностью заняла моё время. Пропало всякое желание играть в кс и гореть там. Пришёл домой, включил DBD и сидишь кайфуешь.
+Есть возможность игры, как за выжившего, так и за маньяка
+Большое кол-во перков и вариаций игры 
+Очень круто играть с друзьями 
-Поиск на роль киллера занимает намного больше времени, чем на поиск за выжившего. В среднем от 2х до 8 минут.
-На маньяке может попастаться кемпер, который будет по к/д стоять у крюка, как пи***ас, а в остальном все отлично
